title: The Spider Inside
description: A group of friends struggle with meth addiction, surrounded by the heartbroken and the paranoid, the sociopaths and the police. Jim and Cherry are looking for happiness, and Tattoo Nik is on the hunt for the next big score. Two Step just wants to keep the party going and Soup is slowly getting lost.Trouble with the law and a city-wide meth shortage push them to the edge, and some are pushed over it, leaving the others to pick up the pieces as best they can.
author: Elias Anderson
